item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (904 points | 224 comments)
2. WebMonkeys: parallel GPU programming in JavaScript (27 points | 2 comments)
3. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (276 points | 102 comments)
4. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (330 points | 118 comments)
5. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (482 points | 448 comments)
6. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (64 points | 13 comments)
7. Cuttlefish 'talk' with their arms, study reveals (14 points | 2 comments)
8. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (417 points | 338 comments)
9. VVVVVV Source Code (242 points | 34 comments)
10. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (61 points | 30 comments)
11. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (121 points | 14 comments)
13. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (131 points | 83 comments)
14. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (82 points | 29 comments)
15. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (591 points | 550 comments)
16. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (62 points | 8 comments)
17. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (33 points | 8 comments)
18. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (150 points | 93 comments)
19. (ab?)using Node module hooks to speed up development (21 points | 5 comments)
20. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (126 points | 68 comments)
21. Loving 21st century gaming like an 18th century furniture expert (14 points | 1 comment)
22. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (315 points | 293 comments)
23. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (208 points | 106 comments)
24. DuoBook: Generate bilingual stories to learn any language (69 points | 50 comments)
25. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (112 points | 129 comments)
26. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (244 points | 78 comments)
27. Sutton and Barto book implementation (61 points | 9 comments)
28. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (95 points | 49 comments)
29. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (149 points | 59 comments)
30. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (103 points | 44 comments)
